item.title: Dragoon FAQ
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions Type !faq drg in #bot_spam for a full list of commands to answer other common questions! How does Raiden Thrust work? Raiden Thrust is an upgraded True Thrust. It combos into both Disembowel and Vorpal Thrust and replaces True Thrust on your bar when itâ€™s ready. You activate it by successfully landing the positional on the fifth hit of your combo (Fang and Claw or Wheeling Thrust following Wheeling Thrust or Fang and Claw, respectively).
